```{r}

        filter(`Date` == max(`Date`),!is.na(ParentCategory)) %>% 
        cluster.data()
```

```{r}
data %>% filter(Id == '007XHTML') %>% 
  select(Id, Date, Gravity, Gravity_Change)
```


```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=20}

source("../apps/visualisations.R")
data %>% 
  #filter(Gravity_Change <0.0010 & Gravity_Change >-0.001) %>%
  filter(Gravity_Change < .2 & Gravity_Change > 0.19) %>% 
  plot.gravity.change.barchart()
```

```{r}

source("../apps/visualisations.R")
data %>% 
  filter(is.na(ParentCategory)) %>% 
  group_by(Id, Title,Gravity, ActivateDate) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(Gravity_Change_mean=median(Gravity_Change, na.rm = T), Gravity_Change_std=sd(Gravity_Change, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  filter(Gravity > 5 & !is.infinite(Gravity_Change_mean) & Gravity_Change_mean>0) %>% 
  arrange(-Gravity_Change_mean) 
  
```
